leadership.name: Dr. Tewodros Tefera
leadership.title: REFOOTURE Project Manager & Co-Strategic Lead
leadership.bio: A dynamic leader in socioeconomic development with extensive experience in regenerative and inclusive food systems, agricultural policy analysis, and market development. He currently serves as the Co-Strategic Leader and Ethiopia Lead for the Food Futures Eastern Africa (REFOOTURE) Project.

leadership.name: Prof. Dr. Gezahegn Berecha Yadessa
leadership.title: Senior Technical Advisor for Regenerative Agriculture, SWR-Ethiopia
leadership.bio: An Ethiopian scholar with extensive experience in teaching, research, and project coordination. He currently serves as Director of the International Institute of Coffee Research at Jimma University.

advisors.name: Prof. Yihenew G. Selassie Mengesha (PhD)
advisors.title: Senior Soil Health Advisor
advisors.bio: Professor of Soil Science with extensive experience in soil chemistry and natural resources management. He has co-developed and co-coordinated 12 projects with Wageningen University and Research.

advisors.name: Tilaye Teklewold Deneke (PhD)
advisors.title: Adviser on Innovation Documentation, Scaling, and Regenerative Agriculture
advisors.bio: An Ethiopian agricultural socio-economist with over 20 years of experience. His expertise spans agricultural extension and economics, institutional resource economics, climate resilience, and food systems.

facilitators.name: Marta Hailemariam Mamo
facilitators.title: Lecturer & Change Facilitator
facilitators.bio: A lecturer in the Department of Rural Development and Agricultural Extension at Jimma University. She serves as a change facilitator for Regenerative Agriculture within the REFOOTURE II project.

facilitators.name: Melkamu Mamuye
facilitators.title: GIS and Remote Sensing Expert
facilitators.bio: A lecturer and researcher at Jimma University with expertise in natural resource management, watershed management, and climate change adaptation. His current research focuses on modeling the impacts of climate change on coffee.
